availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Polly Gray Golihue in Greenup County, Kentucky, in March 1824. Father of Cinderella Golihue, James W. Golihue, Barbary Ellen Golihue, Mary J. Golihue, and John W. Golihue. Married to Sarah James Golihue in Carter County, Kentucky, in January 1847. Father of Prisilla Golihue, Henry W. Golihue, Ruth Golihue, Basil Golihue, Susan Golihue, Emily Golihue, John Golihue, and Elizabeth Golihue. Farmer in Carter County in 1850. Farmer in Carter County in 1860.
